description: Complete system overview detailing the PDF processing pipeline architecture, key components, and how they interact to extract and process laboratory sample data
Detailed documentation of the PDF parsing algorithms including metadata extraction, table detection, header normalization, and data transformation processes implemented in slurp.py
Comprehensive documentation of the Submission and Sample data models, their attributes, relationships, and lifecycle states implemented in domain/models/
Documentation of the Quality Control algorithms including threshold calculations, quality scoring formulas, and batch processing logic implemented across multiple components
End-to-end data flow documentation showing how data moves from PDF upload through extraction, transformation, QC processing, and storage with sequence diagrams
